beer.name: American Amber Ale
beer.description: Tawny in color, with a coffee aroma, tight head and a delicate roasted malt accent. Generous use of hops and a smooth finish.
beer.grains: Northwest Harrington and Klages, 95-115 and 135-165 Crystal.
Northwest Harrington and Klages, 95-115 and 135-165 Crystal.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast and Free Range Coastal Water.
